primevc.mvc.events.MVCEvents

type
class
extends
primevc.core.dispatcher.Signals
subclasses
sample.MainEvents
Basic events for an mvc-application. MVCEvents is a base class thats groups together the events used in an application/subsystem and provides a main access point for them.
